mainContent.introduction: Hi there! I am an aspiring Software Engineer with experience and interest in Full Stack, Machine Learning, Data Science and Cloud Computing. I have a master's degree in Computer Science from New York University and a B.Tech in Computer Science from Rajasthan Technical University, India. I have worked on different languages and frameworks like C++, Python, Ruby and Django but my recent love is for JavaScript, Node, React, Angular, Java and Spring. I am looking for new opportunities in Software Engineering or Full Stack Engineer.

descriptions: Contributed as a full stack developer in a multi-language wealth management portal for client UBS
Worked under two highly experience senior developers having more than 20 years of financial industry experience
Invloved in all phases of agile software development methodology including daily standup, business requirnments analysis and QA management
Developed highly independent web components using Stencil.Js (Web Components Compiler), further introduces those components in Angular and React projects
Developed financial RESTful Web APIs using Spring Boot additionally used Junit, Cucumber, Lombok, Hibernate, PostgreSQL and other Java Technologies
Applied test first approach in the web components using stencil test and jest testing framework
Contributed in building CI/CD pipeline using Docker, Jenkins, AWS EC2 and other devops technologies
Developed rich and robust UI Components using HTML, SCSS, Typescript, Redux and Angular 5+
Implemented RESTful Web API using Spring Boot, Hibernate, JPA and Spring Data
Colloberated with other software developers, QA and Business Analyst while following agile methodologies
Managed and Analysed performance, life cycle, publishing REST API using WSO2 API Manager Tool
Developed CI/CD pipeline using Jenkins and Bitbucket and troubleshooted productions issues
Participated in daily scrum meetings discussing about new features to add, improved performance and daily code maintainence
Developed "Worker Onboarding" backend service using Node, Express, MongoDB, Mongoose and Firebase
Developed React/Redux/React-Native Components to improve the user interactivity and worker management in admin panel
Developed task automation for SQUID (Street QUality Identification Device) using Apache Aireflow
Implemented tasks of image collection, computer vision and data processing using Python and Bash Scripting
Developed data models, NoSQL database and full stack application for NYC Bus locating app using serverless architecture of AWS Lambda
Participated in improving course material with professor and provided great suggestions to further enhance the learning in topics of Pointers, Binary Search Trees, STL and Graph Theory
Taught and assisted undergrad students during recitation and programming labs
Graded papers during assignments, mid-terms and finals

projects.title: Know Your Neighborhood: NYU
projects.subtitle: Android Cloud Project
descriptions: Developed android app for finding best neighbourhood on crime, noise etc. using big data analysis
Implemented visualization using Maps API and D3 to depict statistically the analysis of neighbourhood
Collected and Analysed NYC 311 Data using AWS elastic search and Hadoop to produce insights

projects.title: Twitter Treand App : NYU
projects.subtitle: Tweet Text Sentiment Analysis
descriptions: Implemented real time trend analysis app using AWS Elastic search for data fetching and geo querying
Analysed collected Tweets using Watson Emotional API and Notification service using AWS SNS
Deployed the backend on AWS EC2 instance with load balancing using Node and Express framework

projects.title: Visualization of Twitter Verbal Abuse : NYU
projects.subtitle: Verbal Abuse Analysis of Tweets
descriptions: Implemented a real-time application depicting the verbal abuse on twitter based on demographics
Applied natural language processing to the tweets to segregate emotions including anger and disgust
Programmed user interface using d3.js technology and implemented business logic by Node.js
